text:
At the corner of the city stands café "Le Moment,"
a place where people gather.

Though each movement may be small,
the interlocking gears will surely turn someday──

"I'm at the table on the right
side towards the back of the shop."

Hehe...
Yui, you're still as thoughtful as ever──

Sorry for calling you out...!
There's something I want to discuss.

Oh, did you eat at all? If not, you should order something!
Everything here is delicious──

Ah...! Sorry, almost got carried away there.
Come on, sit down sit down!

Haha, thank you.
Well, if everything is delicious...

...Perhaps I'll try the curry rice. If it took them three days to
perfect it, then it must be out of this world.

Haha, I knew it!
Curry rice is their timeless classic!

Oh my, then I can't wait to try it.
So, Yui, what did you want to discuss with me?

Ah, it's about our magazine's mix-and-match outfit feature.
We're focusing on female web designers this time.

It's perfect for you, Saya... If you don't mind,
could you share with us your usual day-to-day?

I see, that's what it's about.
Well feel free to ask me anything.

──Before that, I like to mention... Did something happen
to the file folder? How did it get all beat up?

Oh, right.
I dropped it earlier.

But a girl who was there helped me pick them up.
That helped me a lot...

How nice... It's fortunate you bumped into someone
who's kind.

Yeah, she had distinct features...
I wonder if she'll come back here again.
